org.apache.spf
Class DNSProbe

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.spf.DNSProbe

public class DNSProbe
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains helper to get all neccassary DNS infos that are needed for SPF

Author:
MimeCast, Norman Maurer

Method Detail

getSpfRecord

protected static java.lang.String getSpfRecord(java.lang.String hostname,
                                               java.lang.String spfVersion)
                                        throws ErrorException,
                                               NeutralException,
                                               NoneException
Get the SPF-Record for a server given it's version TODO: support SPF Records too.

Parameters:
hostname - - The hostname for which we want to retrieve the SPF-Record
spfVersion - - The SPF-Version which should used.
Returns:
The SPF-Record if one is found.
Throws:
ErrorException - if more then one SPF-Record was found.
NoneException - if no SPF-Record was found.
NeutralException - if an invalid SPF-Version was specified.

                                                ErrorException
Get an ArrayList of all TXT Records for a partical domain.

Parameters:
hostname - - The hostname for which the TXT-Records should be retrieved
Returns:
TXT Records-which were found.
Throws:
NoneException - if none TXT-Records were found.
ErrorException

Parameters:
domain - - The domain which should be resolved
Returns:
false or true

getMXRecords

public static java.util.ArrayList getMXRecords(java.lang.String domainName,
                                               int mask,
                                               boolean stripInvalidMX)
                                        throws ErrorException,
                                               NoneException
Get a list of masked IPAddr MX-Records TODO: Check if stripInvalidMX should be removed. I see no need for this.

Parameters:
domainName - - The domainName or ipaddress we want to get the ips for
mask - - The netmask
stripInvalidMX - - Strip mxrecords which belongs to reserved nerworks
Returns:
IPAddresses of the MX-Records
Throws:
NoneException - if no MX-Record was found
ErrorException

Returns:
